description:
A Kiss Note is a powerful notebook that makes anyone who have their names written together instantly fall in love if they kiss each other. This magical item belongs to an angel named Guri whose job as cupid is to create couples. However, she accidentally writes down Aino Seiji, a regular high school student, and unless he kisses someone in the course of 24 hours, Guri will die, and Seiji will remain a virgin for the rest of his life.
Eventually, Guri convinces Seiji to kiss his crush, Hiyama Akane, the school`s popular girl who turns out to be a http://anidb.net/t1208 [yandere], with her feelings for Seiji bordering on obsessive and psychotic. To make the matters worse, after Akane and Seiji become a couple, Guri decides that she likes Seiji as well. Now, what seems awesome to most guys becomes hell for Seiji who just wants a normal relationship with a girl.
Source: MangaHelpers

REGULAR.description:
Aino Seiji is your typical male high school student when he meets Guri, who is a shinigami? No, a pervert--no! An angel?! Guri introduces him to the Kiss Note and explains that if he doesn`t kiss someone within 24 hours, she will die. So it`s off to Seiji`s school to find his school crush, his classmate, Hiyama Akane, but of course nothing is ever so simple...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Getting In on This, Too x Whoa! Forbidden Love?!
Je me suis rajoutée ! × Oh ! Un amour interdit ?
Watashi mo, Sansen Shimasu x Hoa!! Kindan no Ai Desuka!!
私も, 参戦します × ほぁー!! 禁断の愛ですか!!

REGULAR.description:
During Yuzu`s daily routine of stalking through her sister, Akane`s trash, Guri suddenly appears and the two girls begin taking love consultations at school. Seiji and Akane reluctantly agree to help look for coupling candidates and soon the group thinks they have found a pair of ideal targets. However, things get much more complicated when no one can agree if the intended couple really share each other`s feelings. In the midst of all this Yuzu and Guri scheme an elaborate plan to prove their instincts are right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kunsuka Kunsuka x Seiji-kun o Kizutsukete Ii no wa... Watashi dake na no
Snif, snif × La seule autorisée à toucher à seiji... c`est moi
Sniff Sniff x The Only One Who May Hurt Seiji-kun... Is Me
くんすかくんすか × 青司くんを傷つけていいのは... 私だけなの

REGULAR.description:
Guri finally meets Seiji`s younger sister, Akua and is surprised by her rather cold attitude towards her big brother. The cupid decides to learn more about what changed this once loving sister, and Yuzu is right there to help (or make things worse...). But while the girls are getting acquainted the demon Stolas appears and a panick ensues! The strangely psychotic penguin seems to have a special affinity for Akua and sends her running. It`s up to her big brother Seiji to save her like he used to.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can Handle This Myself! x Wassup
Je peux me débrouiller seule ! × Yo !
Watashi Hitori de Nantoka Dekiru! x Choriissu
私一人でなんとか出来る! × チョリーッス

REGULAR.description:
Yuzu will go to great lengths for her beloved older sister, Akane, even skipping her own lessons 
to watch over her. Despite harsh words from Akane, Yuzu refuses to relinquish her forbidden love even for someone like Seiji, who she may care about more than she realizes. Meanwhile, on the hunt for a new couple to match, fortune smiles upon Seiji and Guri when a classmate approaches them saying she has a crush she would like paired with. The request turns complicated when the classmate, Shikimi, doesn`t seem to know the name of her intended partner. While helping Shikimi find this mystery boy Seiji finds that this meek bespectacled girl is not quite what she appears to be...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Not Going to Lose! x Are You Like Me?
Je ne perdrai pas ! × Serais-tu une camarade ?
Zettai Makemasen kara! x Moshikashite Onakama Desuka?
絶対負けませんから! × もしかしてお仲間ですか?

REGULAR.description:
In a desperate struggle to find Seiji, Akane and Yuzu seem oddly worried when Guri tells them that he is off with Shikimi searching for her crush. The concern seems warranted when Seiji finds himself in the midst of a torture session with Shikimi. According to this mistress of disguise her ultimate goal isn`t just Seiji, but Akane and Yuzu. What is her link to the two sisters and what is it that she`s after? And just what has Seiji been dragged into this time? Akane fights Shikimi fiercely to keep the truth hidden. Just when everything seems resolved, Seiji has stopped breathing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est quoi, l’amour ? × Prosternation divine en direct LOL
What Is Love? x Kami Is Prostrating Himself Now lolol
`Ai`tte Nanika Nya x Kami Dogeza nau ww
`愛`って何かにゃー × 神土下座なうww

REGULAR.description:
Summer vacation! Seiji, Guri, Akane and Yuzu have invited Akua to go with them to the beach. Akane tries to get Akua to go swimming with her in attempt to get closer to Seiji`s little sister, but Akua gives her the cold shoulder. Pouting at her brother and his harem Akua goes to swim by herself but a dark shadow looms beneath her. Meanwhile, summer also means tests of courage! Guri suddenly invites Seiji, Akane, and Yuzu to the school after dark for a test of courage but her real motives are to pair another young couple who have asked for her help. Seiji thinks something isn`t quite right about the pair though...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go to the Beach with Me? x It`s Not a Matter of Knowing or Not
Issho ni Umi ni Ikanaika? x Wakaru Wakaranai no Mondai ja Nai Desho
On va à la mer ensemble ? × Ce n’est pas quelque chose de rationnel
一緒に海に行かないか? × わかるわからないの問題じゃないでしょ

REGULAR.description:
After an argument with Seiji, Guri goes wandering the city on her own. During a stop at the bookstore for the latest volume from her favorite manga artist, a handsome stranger stops to talk to her. When the unknown young man invites Guri out on a date she can`t bring herself to refuse. Getting to experience a date with someone other than Seiji seemed like a good idea but Guri can`t help be feel something isn`t quite right. Meanwhile, things have gotten more complicated in Akane`s family and she`s suddenly under house-arrest!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s a Festival x How Did It Come to This?!
Le festival bat son plein × Pourquoi on en est là ?
Omatsuri jaai x Doushite Kou Nattaa!!
お祭りじゃーい × どうしてこうなったぁ!!

REGULAR.description:
Yuzu and Guri are off to save Akane! Several obstacles are placed in their path but the girls overcome them with ease, only to find that Akane is not herself. A happy reunion quickly turns to shock as Akane turns her blade on her sister. Yuzu tries desperately to reach her beloved sister but nothing seems to get through. When Seiji finally appears Akane`s love is put to the test, will she do as her mother commands and get rid of Seiji once and for all?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu × On est rivales !
Farewell x We`re Rivals, Obviously!!
Sayonara x Koigataki Desho!!
さよなら × 恋敵でしょ!!

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for the school cultural festival! Excitement is in the air as life seems to be back to normal for Seiji, Akane, and the rest, but all is not what it seems. Shikimi suddenly has transferred into Seiji`s class and it now has Akane on edge. When its decided that their class will be putting on a play with Shikimi in the leading role of the princess Akane is roped into playing the prince while Guri gets to play the rival pirate to the prince. On top of all this even Yuzu has started acting strangely and Seiji finds himself stuck in the middle, as always.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Absolument... rien × Je dois avoir un problème
Absolutely... Nothing... x There`s Just Something Wrong with Me...
Zenzen... Nanimo... x Chotto, Douka Shiteimashita...
全然... 何も... × ちょっと, どうかしていました...

REGULAR.description:
As his family takes off for a few days, Seiji finds himself home alone. Well, except for Guri, of course. But the peace of the moment is short-lived when Akane shows up at his door saying she`s there to spend the night while his family is away and to claim the kiss that Seiji had promised her. Things only get more complicated as usual when Yuzu and Shikimi show up as well. Things seem to go rather okay until Seiji`s younger sister Akua returns home early to find Seiji surrounded by all four girls in a compromising situation and proceeds to scold her brother for his behavior. Curious about the siblings` relationship, Guri drags Akua out shopping to get to the bottom of her brother-complex.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Here to Stay the Night x I`m... Growing Up, Too
Je viens passer la nuit × Moi aussi, j’ai grandi
Otomari ni Kichaimashita x Watashi Datte... Seichou Surunda yo
お泊まりに来ちゃいました × 私だって... 成長するんだよ

REGULAR.description:
Guri has gone missing. Seiji seems unphased while Akane is thrilled but Yuzu is deeply concerned for her friend and begs Seiji to seriously look for Guri. Meanwhile, Shikimi is up to no good and Seiji catches her in the midst of trying to trick Kusunoki-sensei. Seiji drags Shikimi away to save the hapless teacher, but winds up having the tables turned on him when she traps him. A confrontation boils up and Guri finally falls from the sky, literally, to ask Seiji how he truly feels about her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doko Ittanda Aitsu x Ima made Taihen Osewa ni Narimashita
Elle est passée où ? × Merci pour tout
Where Did She Go? x I Apologize for Troubling You Until Now
どこ行ったんだ あいつ × 今まで大変お世話になりました

REGULAR.description:
With some divine intervention, Seiji and Yuzu are off to hell to see if they can return Guri to normal. With Coraly`s help they attempt to disguise themselves as demons but the jig is up when they happen to run into Shikimi as she wanders the streets. As they are chased by the demon police, Akane shows up to makes a half-hearted attempt to return Guri to her senses. When that fails, she attempts to drag Seiji back home. Yuzu finally convinces Seiji to talk to Guri to let prove to her that he does actually care about her but will it be enough? Will the real Guri ever come back?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonne idée ! Mourez ! × Je l’ai enfin compris
Right, Let`s All Die! x I Finally Understand
Sou Da, Shinimashou! x Watashi Yatto Wakarimashita
そうだ, 死にましょう! × 私やっとわかりました
